dcterms:title: Choose what you want to tag
rdfs:label: Describe this photograph..
dcterms:description: Please select which of the types of information you would want to capture about this photograph

dcterms:title: Additional information
rdfs:label: Enter any other information about this person.
dcterms:description: Please add any additional information about the person.

dcterms:title: Whole photograph
rdfs:label: Whole photograph
dcterms:description: Enter whatever information you have about this photograph

dcterms:title: Choose Tag
rdfs:label: Start typing to find a relevant tag.

dcterms:title: Additional Tags
rdfs:label: Can't find a relevant tag? Enter your own tags below.
dcterms:description: Please try to find your tag in the list above first.

dcterms:title: Person
rdfs:label: Person
dcterms:description: Move the red box to highlight one person, and enter information about them below. You can repeat this for as many people as you recognise.

dcterms:title: Tags
rdfs:label: Tags
dcterms:description: Tagging photographs will help people to search the collection. Please use tags/suggestions from the autocomplete list whenever possible. If you cannot find a matching suggestion, then enter your own tags in the additional tags box.

dcterms:title: Date taken
rdfs:label: What is the exact date this photograph was taken? (DD/MM/YYYY)
dcterms:description: Leave blank if you don't know.

dcterms:title: Year taken
rdfs:label: What year was this photograph taken?
dcterms:description: Leave blank if you don't know.

dcterms:title: Place taken
rdfs:label: Where was this photograph taken?
dcterms:description: Type a town or village, then use the map to pinpoint more exact location.

dcterms:title: Description
rdfs:label: Describe the contents of this photograph.
dcterms:description: Fill in any extra information you have about this photo or leave blank

dcterms:title: Name
rdfs:label: What is this personâ€™s name?
dcterms:description: Please enter first names and or surnames.
